operations.notes: In order to get a parameters value, you must give the mac address and the parameter name of the parameter, by calling /mobileclient/get?type=get,macadd=....,param=.... .

In order to set a parameters value, you must give the mac address, the parameter name and the value of the parameter, by calling /mobileclient/set?type=set,macadd=....,param=....,value=.... .As param you can give one of the following parameters: controlmode, dlmodulation1, dlmodulation2, ulmodulation1, ulmodulation2.

-If you change the value of dlmodulation1 you must also set the value of dlmodulation2 to the appropriate.
-If you change the value of ulmodulation1 you must also set the value of ulmodulation2 to the appropriate.
